title: Robinson Department Store Food Court
typeOfFood: Chinese, Thai, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Moringa noodle soups food stall in the Robinson Department store (Sukhumvit branch), bottom floor. The noodles are handmade and come from the leaves of the moringa tree. Owner speaks English and can prepare a vegan soup using mushroom broth. Could also buy noodles to take home.
